TopicTitle: Epileptic Seizure warning closes automatically before one can read it

Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.1.3 (latest) | Mods: none | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: Windows 10 Home 22H2 | CPU: AMD Ryzen 7 2700X | GPU: ASUS ROG STRIX GeForce RTX 2060 | RAM: 64 GB

 

After installing the new patch, I loaded into the game and before the main menu was this large text warning about seizures caused by lighting effects. It's something I've seen before in various games but this warning has a lot of text and only a few seconds to even look at it before it closes and jumps straight to the main menu.
